query:
ALTER TABLE `merchants` 
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS `business_type` enum('store','services','both') AFTER `currency`,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS `setup_completed` tinyint NOT NULL DEFAULT 0 AFTER `business_type`,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS `setup_completed_at` timestamp NULL AFTER `setup_completed`,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS `address` varchar(500) AFTER `setup_completed_at`,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS `description` text AFTER `address`,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS `working_hours_type` enum('24_7','weekdays','custom') DEFAULT 'weekdays' AFTER `description`,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS `working_hours` text AFTER `working_hours_type`;
